text: qal aladhi eindah eilm min alktab: 'ana atik bhdha alearsh qabl airtidad ajfank 'iidha thrrakat lilnazar fi shy'. fadhan lah sulayman fadaea allh, fa'ataa balersh. falamaa rah sulayman hadrana ladayh thabtana eindah qal: hdha min fadl rabiy aladhi khalaqani wakhalaq alkwn klh; lykhtbrny: 'a'ashkur bdhlk aetrafana biniematih taealaa ely 'am 'akfur bitark alshkr? waman shakar lilah ealaa nieamah f'inn nafe dhlk yarjie 'ilyh, wamin jhd alnaemat wtrk alshukr fa'iina rabiy ghaniun ean shkrh, karim yaeumu bkhyrh fi aldunya alshakr walkafr, thuma yuhasibuhum wyjazyhm fi alakhrt
